context_bundle.summary: Docker containerization for packaging applications with dependencies, building images, running containers, and orchestrating multi-container applications with docker-compose

onboarding.quick_start: Write Dockerfile with base image, dependencies, and CMD. Build with docker build -t name:tag. Run with docker run. Orchestrate with docker-compose.yml.
common_patterns: Dockerfile: FROM base, COPY files, RUN commands, EXPOSE ports, CMD entrypoint
Multi-stage builds: Reduce image size by separating build and runtime stages
docker-compose: Define services, networks, volumes in YAML
Networking: Bridge networks for service-to-service communication
Volumes: Persist data outside container lifecycle
Health checks: HEALTHCHECK instruction for container monitoring
known_errors: Layer caching: Order Dockerfile commands from least to most frequently changed
Security: Don't run as root, scan for vulnerabilities, minimize attack surface
Image size: Use alpine base images, multi-stage builds to reduce size
